title: How to Get the Urine Smell Out of Your Bed

steps.headline: Go to your room and find the urine location on your bed.
steps.description: you will see a dark spot on your bed that's where you peed.

steps.headline: Put dish soap on a washcloth and rub it on the location.
steps.description: this will help it to go away on your bed.

steps.headline: Put hand soap on the location where the urine is.
steps.description: put hand soap on a washcloth and rub it where the urine is and this may help it smell better.

steps.headline: Get a wet washcloth and rinse it for 10 seconds.
steps.description: this may help it go away on your bed and the dark spot will go away.

steps.headline: Get a towel and dry for 20 minutes.
Get an air freshener and spray it on your bed.
steps.description: this will help your bed smell good.

steps.headline: Using a wet cloth, clean up the urine spot and make sure the area is thoroughly damp without being wet.
Sprinkle a thick layer of baking soda over the location.
Allow it to sit for a while.
Once dry, vacuum it off of the bed.

text: Steps Go to your room and find the urine location on your bed. you will see a dark spot on your bed that's where you peed. Put dish soap on a washcloth and rub it on the location. this will help it to go away on your bed. Put hand soap on the location where the urine is. put hand soap on a washcloth and rub it where the urine is and this may help it smell better. Get a wet washcloth and rinse it for 10 seconds. this may help it go away on your bed and the dark spot will go away. Get a towel and dry for 20 minutes.  Get an air freshener and spray it on your bed. this will help your bed smell good. Done. Now the urine gone. Using Baking Soda Using a wet cloth, clean up the urine spot and make sure the area is thoroughly damp without being wet.  Sprinkle a thick layer of baking soda over the location.  Allow it to sit for a while. At least overnight. Once dry, vacuum it off of the bed.

you will see a dark spot on your bed that's where you peed.
Put dish soap on a washcloth and rub it on the location.
this will help it to go away on your bed.
Put hand soap on the location where the urine is.
put hand soap on a washcloth and rub it where the urine is and this may help it smell better.
Get a wet washcloth and rinse it for 10 seconds.
this may help it go away on your bed and the dark spot will go away.
Get a towel and dry for 20 minutes.
Get an air freshener and spray it on your bed.
this will help your bed smell good.
Using Baking Soda Using a wet cloth, clean up the urine spot and make sure the area is thoroughly damp without being wet.
Sprinkle a thick layer of baking soda over the location.
Allow it to sit for a while.
Once dry, vacuum it off of the bed.
